channel.title: Help Adding Server to moparscape!
channel.description: How do i add a server to moparscape? i clicked add and stuff but it says i need to add the following cruditials. Where at tho?

item.title: Help Adding Server to moparscape!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

s0uljag0d:

How do i add a server to moparscape? i clicked add and stuff but it says i need to add the following cruditials. Where at tho?

Do you mean Moparscape server status checker? U need to click on add server (Log in on ur account) then you post your server then you need to go to a url to proove that it is ur ip used. (if you have VPS go on ur vps to that site) then You get a name and a password make sure that name and password is always not used , then wait for a some min , And tada Ur moparscape server adver page

Pm me for question i wont look back here

Read full topic
